backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing e-commerce backend with product management, cart operations, testimonials, user profiles, contact info, social media links, and hero section management, all protected by role-based access control (admin/user permissions).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four completed features for generating and integrating Indian ethnic fashion-themed images: hero background, category previews, product fallbacks, and static asset rendering.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components and pages, detailing the React application structure with admin panel, product catalog, cart/checkout flow, and integration of newly generated category-specific and fallback images.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color schemes using oklch color space for consistent design tokens across the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with all routes (public and admin), theme provider, toast notifications, and AdminRoute protection wrapper for admin pages.
frontend/src/components/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin panel layout wrapper providing header with logout button, sidebar navigation, and main content area for authenticated admin users.
frontend/src/components/AdminNav.tsx: Admin sidebar navigation component with icon-labeled links to dashboard, products, testimonials, contact info, social media, and hero section management pages, highlighting active route.
frontend/src/components/AdminRoute.tsx: Protected route wrapper component that verifies user authentication and admin privileges, redirecting unauthorized users to login or home page with loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/CartItem.tsx: Displays a single cart item with product image, name, description, quantity controls (increment/decrement), price, and remove button. Uses useCart hook for updating quantity and removing items.
frontend/src/components/CategoryFilter.t: Renders a tabbed category filter with options for All Products, Sarees, Western Dresses, Lehenga, and Jewellery. Allows users to filter products by category.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmDia: Reusable confirmation dialog component for delete operations with customizable title and description. Uses AlertDialog from UI components.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with brand logo, quick links, contact information, social media links, and copyright notice. Includes attribution to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Homepage hero section with background image, headline, description, and CTA buttons. Fetches content from useHeroSection hook with fallback defaults.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper component that renders Navbar, page content via Outlet, and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with logo, navigation links (Home, Products, Contact, Admin), shopping cart icon with item count badge, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product card component displaying product image, name, description, price, and add-to-cart button. Includes category-based fallback images and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ProductForm.tsx: Form component for adding or editing products with fields for name, description, price, image URL, and category. Handles validation and submission via useAddProduct/useUpdateProduct hooks.
frontend/src/components/SocialMediaLinks: Renders social media icons (Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp) as circular buttons that link to URLs fetched from the useSocialMediaLinks hook, with default fallback URLs.
frontend/src/components/StarRating.tsx: Displays a 5-star rating component that can be interactive or read-only, with filled yellow stars up to the rating value and empty stars thereafter.
Displays a single testimonial in a card format showing customer name, star rating, review text, and date.
Form component for adding or editing testimonials with fields for customer name, star rating, review text, and date, using react-hook-form and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Renders a grid of testimonial cards fetched from useTestimonials hook, with loading state and conditional rendering if no testimonials exist.
frontend/src/components/UpiPayment.tsx: UPI payment component with tabs for UPI ID input and QR code scanning, simulating payment processing with a 90% success rate after 2 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Provides authentication state and methods including identity, admin status check, login/logout functions, and loading states using Internet Identity and actor hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Manages shopping cart state with queries for cart items and total, plus mutations for adding, updating quantity, and removing items, including a computed cart item count.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactInfo.ts: Provides query hook to fetch contact information and mutation hook to update email, phone, address, and business hours via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useHeroSection.ts: Provides query hook to fetch hero section data and mutation hook to update headline, description, and background image URL via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity storage, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for CRUD operations on products, including fetching by category, adding, updating, and deleting products with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSocialMedia.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and update social media links (Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp) with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestimonials.ts: Exports React Query hooks for CRUD operations on customer testimonials, including fetching, adding, updating, and deleting with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom Indian-themed color palette (maroon, gold, purple) for light and dark modes, plus Google Fonts imports for Playfair Display and Inter.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for state management and authentication.
frontend/src/pages/AdminContactInfo.tsx: Admin page for managing contact information (email, phone, address, business hours) using react-hook-form with validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard displaying statistics cards for total products, testimonials, and categories with quick action links for content management.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHeroSection.tsx: Admin page for editing hero section content (headline, description, background image) with live image preview and form validation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login page that authenticates users via Internet Identity and redirects authenticated admins to the admin panel, showing error messages for non-admin users.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProducts.tsx: Admin page for managing products with a table view displaying product details and actions to add, edit, or delete products using modal dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSocialMedia.tsx: Admin page with a form to update social media links (Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp) with URL validation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminTestimonials.tsx: Admin page for managing customer testimonials with a table view and actions to add, edit, or delete testimonials.
frontend/src/pages/Cart.tsx: Shopping cart page displaying cart items with an order summary card and checkout button, showing empty state when cart is empty.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Checkout page with a two-step flow: customer details form followed by UPI payment component, with order summary sidebar.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page component that displays business contact information (email, phone, address, hours) in card layouts, fetching data from useContactInfo hook with loading states and default fallback values.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page component featuring a hero section, three feature cards (Premium Quality, Authentic Products, Fast Delivery), and a clickable category grid for Sarees, Dresses, Lehenga, and Jewellery with category images.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Payment failure page displaying an error message with common failure reasons and action buttons to retry payment or return to cart.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Payment success page showing a confirmation message with order details and navigation buttons to continue shopping or return home.
frontend/src/pages/Products.tsx: Products listing page with category filtering, displaying products in a responsive grid with loading skeletons and empty state handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH, container settings, extended theme with custom fonts (Playfair Display, Inter), shadows, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking Koshambari e-commerce site features, including completed image generation tasks for hero backgrounds, category previews, and fallback product images across four categories.
